description: PIMS 3527 - Capacity Building for PCB Elimination in Ghana

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: Review, develop, and adopt legislation and policies. Enhanced technical capacity of public sector authorities for sound PCB management. Refined and updated inventory of PCB to increase its comprehensiveness. New administrative systems developed and implemented for PCB-related enforcement and inspection activities after inventory compilation Institutional and normative frameworks strengthened for the management of PCB throughout their life-cycle. Temporary storage facilities identified, constructed or upgraded
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PIMS 3527-Capacity Building fo
